name: proof-of-art
description: Blockchain-based AI art authorship verification system

scripts.install:all: npm install && npm install --prefix frontend && npm install --prefix backend && npm install --prefix contracts
scripts.dev: concurrently "npm run dev:frontend" "npm run dev:backend" "npm run dev:node"
scripts.build: npm run build:frontend && npm run build:backend
scripts.deploy:local: cd contracts && npx hardhat run scripts/deploy.js --network localhost
scripts.deploy:custom: cd contracts && npx hardhat run scripts/deploy.js --network custom
scripts.test: npm run test:contracts && npm run test:backend
scripts.lint: npm run lint:frontend && npm run lint:backend
scripts.clean: rm -rf node_modules frontend/node_modules backend/node_modules contracts/node_modules frontend/.next backend/dist contracts/artifacts contracts/cache

author: Proof-of-Art Team
